The way I understood Huerthle cells was that they can be kind on an indeterminate precancerous cell. One that could be malignant or benign but I really may be wrong about that. Dictionary says neoplasm is abnormal growth of cells that doesn't necessarily mean cancer. Adenomas are growths of tissue on a gland.Hope this helps even a little bitMargie
